attributes.action: Scrap or reduce the salary and income requirements for work and family visas.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure that families are not unduly impacted, the government should either eliminate this new policy or lower the income threshold requirement in the name of justice and human rights.
attributes.background: The new policy of raising the income threshold for skilled worker visas and family visas should be abandoned by the government because it will make it impossible for many people to meet the requirements given their low income, which will have a major negative impact on families.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel increase to minimum income requirement for Skilled Worker and Family visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652619

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
